titleStmt.title: Hic incipit paruus Catho
Catonis disticha. English and Latin.
titleStmt.author: Cato, Marcus Porcius, 234-149 B.C., attributed name.
Burgh, Benedict.

notesStmt.note: A loose translation into English by Benedict Burgh, with the original Latin text, of selections from the "Parvus Cato" and of the whole of "Catonis disticha".
The disticha, wrongly attributed to Marcus Porcius Cato, in fact date from imperial times. The "Parvus Cato" is usually erroneously attributed to Daniel Church.
In this edition, [A]2r line 2 of text begins: Whanne.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
